courseSectionInformation: Same as TE 401. 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. 1 to 4 graduate hours. May be repeated.
description: Project-based exploration with teams of students working together in a large innovation and entrepreneurial context. Encourage development of innovative, leadership, and entrepreneurial skill sets, including financing, marketing, sales, operations, business plans, and management. Same as TE 401. 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. 1 to 4 graduate hours. May be repeated.
label: Developing Breakthrough Projects
